alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Huntingdon; Northern Centre; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT BEDFORD...NORTHWESTERN HUNTINGDON... SOUTHWESTERN CENTRE AND BLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers along a line extending from near Philipsburg to Blue Knob to Somerset. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts over 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Altoona, Hollidaysburg, Tyrone, Bedford, Philipsburg, Roaring Spring, Clearville, Bald Eagle, New Enterprise, Martinsburg, Lakemont, Everett, Bellwood, Warriors Mark, Claysburg, Williamsburg, Duncansville, Osterburg, Osceola Mills and Tipton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This gusty line of showers may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for central and south central Pennsylvania. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central and central Pennsylvania.
